Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies

Class CardValueMap

java.lang.Object
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies.CardValueMap
public class CardValueMap extends Object
Associates each instance of Rumour card with a Card value for a SINGLE CPUPlayer's chosen chosen strategy.

Achieved using a Map with keys of type RumourCard and values of type CardValue.

Designed assuming there are no duplicated Rumour cards circulating in the game.

Knows all existing Rumour cards in the game : they are map's keys.

Queried by CPU strategies to find the cards with the best Hunt! effects, the worst overall cards ...

Each instance of CPU strategy has its own CardValueMap with its own values (they are not shared).

Can be dynamically updated by CPU strategies.

See Also:
  • CardValue
  • RumourCard
  • ExistingRumourCards
  • CPUStrategy
  • CPUStrategy#updateBehavior(boolean, Identity, RumourCardsPile)

    • getSubValues

      private static List<Integer> getSubValues(Map<RumourCard,CardValue> M, ToIntFunction<CardValue> subValueGetter)
      Returns a list of Integer values corresponding to one field of the given map's Card values. The field is obtained using the corresponding getter as the second parameter : for example, CardValue.getHuntValue() will select only the Hunt! effects of the Rumour cards contained in the given map.
      Parameters:
      M - The map containing only the cards of which we want to know the subvalues.
      subValueGetter - An integer getter of class CardValue, corresponding to the field of interest.
      Returns:
      A list of Integer values corresponding to the field of interest of the given map's Card values.

    • getCardsWithSubValue

      private List<RumourCard> getCardsWithSubValue(Map<RumourCard,CardValue> M, ToIntFunction<CardValue> subValueGetter, int lookingFor)
      Finds all the Rumour cards whose associated value's chosen field is equal to the given integer. The field is obtained using the corresponding getter as the second parameter : for example, CardValue.getHuntValue() will match cards whose Hunt! effect values are equal to the given integer.
      Parameters:
      M - The map containing only the cards of which we want to know the subvalues.
      subValueGetter - An integer getter of class CardValue, corresponding to the field used for matching the cards on equality with the given integer.
      lookingFor - The integer value that must be matched by a card's value chosen field for it to be retained. For example, the maximum value for a Hunt! effect.
      Returns:
      A list of Rumour cards of which, the value for the choosen field matches the given integer.

    • getAverageHuntValue

      public double getAverageHuntValue(RumourCardsPile rcp)
      Parameters:
      rcp - The deck of which we compute the average Hunt! effect value.
      Returns:
      The average value of the Hunt! effects of all Rumour cards contained within the given deck.
